participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, Emily loves to share her passion for food and her experiences with her cat Spook.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and resourceful, Jake enjoys sharing his love for nature and adventure with others.
participant_2.background: my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker. i'm also a graduate student.

content.text: oh   cool   do you like olives
